Source.Name: packmp3
Source.Summary: packMP3 is a compression program for MP3 files.
Source.Description: packMP3 is a compression program specially designed for further compression of MPEG-1 Audio Layer III audio files without causing any further loss. Typically it reduces the file size of a MP3 file by 16% based on tests with 6000 randomly selected files.

Package.Name: packmp3
Package.Summary: packMP3 is a compression program for MP3 files.
Package.Description: packMP3 is a compression program specially designed for further compression of MPEG-1 Audio Layer III audio files without causing any further loss. Typically it reduces the file size of a MP3 file by 16% based on tests with 6000 randomly selected files.
